pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Lambdabot is an IRC bot written over several years by those on the #haskell IRC channel.
Provided plugins:
[activity] Check where and how much is lambdabot used. [karma] Track who's been good and who's been naughty. [poll] Let the people vote. [seen] Track who was around when. [tell] Leave messages for other users.
